items.item_details: EAST SIDE UNION HIGH SCHOOL DISTRICTTO:Board of TrusteesFROM:Dan Moser, Interim SuperintendentPREPARED BY:Cathy Giammona, Interim Associate Superintendent, Human Resources and InstructionSUBJECT:Receive and Sunshine the Initial Proposal for Successor Contract: From East Side Teachers Association to East Side Union High School District The District has received a copy of the East Side Teachers Association's (ESTA) initial bargaining proposal, a copy of which is attached.  Per the Government Code, the District must receive and sunshine in open session the initial proposal of any bargaining unit prior to commencing negotiations.  Administration recommends that the Board receive, sunshine, and take any public comment on the initial proposal of the East Side Teachers Association.FISCAL IMPACT:To be NegotiatedFUNDING SOURCE:VariousRECOMMENDATION:It is recommended that the Board of Trustees receive, sunshine, and take any public comment on the initial proposal of the East Side Teachers Association (ESTA).
